channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab A9 Plus : il y a 100 € de réduction pour cette tablette familiale (écran 11″, 90 Hz, Dolby Atmos) lors du pré-Black Friday
item.description: Dotée d’un grand écran taillé pour le streaming et la navigation web, la Galaxy Tab A9 Plus assume pleinement son rôle de tablette loisirs dans le salon comme dans la chambre. Et pour le pré-Black Friday, elle se fait encore plus douce sur le porte-monnaie, son prix glisse de 260,99 euros à 159,99 euros chez Darty.

item.title: This is the "worst-selling Microsoft product of all time" - and there's a good reason you've probably never heard of it
item.description: Microsoft’s OS/2 for Mach 20 sold just eleven copies, revealing how innovation without practical value can lead to total market failure.

item.title: Marshall Heston 120 Review: Premium Style, Restrained Sound
item.description: Marshall's first soundbar offers premium sound and style, but misses one crucial element.

item.title: Why AI pilots fail - and how manufacturers can break the cycle
item.description: Too many AI projects stall because organizations fall in love with the technology, not the outcome.

item.title: Amazon MGM+ wanted more ‘personal’ and ‘believable’ Merry Men in Robin Hood episode 4, but you won’t see the biggest change coming
item.description: I can’t get enough of the gender-swapped Merry Men in Robin Hood episode 4, and that’s part of the MGM+ show’s creators ‘plan’.

item.title: 5 ways to manage hypertension or high blood pressure, according to science
item.description: Getting a hypertension notification from your Apple Watch is just the start – now you need to change these 5 key habits.

item.title: How my meal delivery company beat the odds to get to profitability
item.description: A case study in the value of focus In early 2022, the meal delivery company I founded, Tovala, went out to raise $100mm from venture capitalists. Our business could not have been hotter. We’d crossed $110mm of revenue, growing over 100% YoY. We had retention that was 3–4 times better than other meal delivery services. We had low awareness, lots of room for product innovation, and a seemingly clear path to an IPO....

item.title: Amazon slashes the price of this Kindle Colorsoft bundle in an early Black Friday deal
item.description: Amazon slashes the price of the Kindle Colorsoft bundle by £90 in an early Black Friday deal.

item.title: New Samsung Galaxy S26 leak may have revealed weights and sizes – and how they compare to the iPhone 17
item.description: We're gradually learning more about what to expect from Samsung's flagship phones in 2026.

item.title: 16 Best Subscription Boxes for Kids (2025): STEM, Books, Clothes, Snacks
item.description: These monthly deliveries get kids coding and cooking while encouraging them to learn science and read about the world.

item.title: Test du Xiaomi TV S Pro Mini LED 55 2026 : le Premium qui se veut abordable, pari réussi ?
item.description: La série TV S Pro Mini LED 2026 est la nouvelle proposition de Xiaomi dans le segment des téléviseurs Premium, avec une technologie d’affichage Mini LED combinée à un système Quantum Dot. Nous l’avons testé.

item.title: How soapy micro dramas became Hollywood’s next big bet
item.description: This is The Stepback, a weekly newsletter breaking down one essential story from the tech world. For more on Hollywood trends and streaming culture, follow Charles Pulliam-Moore. The Stepback arrives in our subscribers' inboxes at 8AM ET. Opt in for The Stepback here. How it started Once upon a time (read: a few years ago), […]

item.title: Shadow AI: the next frontier of unseen risk
item.description: Organizations lack visibility into how employees use AI, introducing significant risks that must be addressed.

item.title: The Lavazza Assoluta is a quirky coffee machine that adjusts its own settings to suit your beans – provided you buy the right ones
item.description: If you don't mind sticking with Lavazza's own beans, the Assoluta will deliver consistently well-extracted coffee every morning.
